definition: transformed from a liquid into a soft semisolid or solid mass, to change from a liquid to a thickened or solid state
details:
adjective
- transformed from a liquid into a soft semisolid or solid mass
= example: transformed from a liquid into a soft semisolid or solid mass
= synonyms: coagulated
verb
- to change from a liquid to a thickened or solid state
= example: to change from a liquid to a thickened or solid state
= synonyms: clot
- to cause to change from a liquid to a solid or thickened state
= synonyms: clot
